name: Black Coffee
description: Coffee from its Origin. Proudly grown in Ethiopia.

name: Macchiato
description: A popular Ethiopian espresso topped with a small amount of steamed milk for a rich, bold flavor.

name: Spiced Coffee
description: A unique brew infused with Ethiopian spices such as cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves, offering a flavorful twist.

name: Jebena Coffee
description: Brewed in a traditional clay pot called a 'jebena', this coffee is part of the ceremonial heritage of Ethiopia.

name: Bunna Be Neter Kibbeh
description: A bold Ethiopian coffee mixed with spiced clarified butter, offering a rich and warming traditional flavor.

name: Cold Brew Ethiopian
description: Smooth, slow-brewed Ethiopian coffee served chilled, highlighting its natural fruity and floral notes.

name: Ethiopian Latte
description: Espresso made from Ethiopian beans topped with steamed milk for a smooth and creamy experience.
